## EthersLiquity.closeTrove() method

Close existing Trove by repaying all debt and withdrawing all collateral.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
closeTrove(overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<TroveClosureDetails>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./arth-lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TroveClosureDetails](./arth-lib-base.troveclosuredetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./arth-lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.
